=======
History
=======

0.2.1 (2017-05-03)
------------------

* Make command line arguments required, resulting in better error messages.
* Refactored testing scripts to be more user-friendly.


0.2.0 (2017-04-19)
------------------

* First release on PyPI (as pgdedupe).


0.1.0 (2016-12-14)
------------------

* First release on PyPI (as superdeduper).
